evidence.text: i. The requirement that the recipient not "use grant funds to promote 'gender ideology,' as defined in E.O. 14168, Defending Women from Gender Ideology Extremism and Restoring Biological Truth to the Federal Government";

extracted.value: The requirement that the recipient not 'use grant funds to promote 'gender ideology,' as defined in E.O. 14168, Defending Women from Gender Ideology Extremism and Restoring Biological Truth to the Federal Government

evidence.text: ii. The requirement that the recipient "agrees that its compliance in all respects with all applicable Federal anti-discrimination laws is material to the U.S. Government's payment decisions for purposes of section 3729(b)(4) of title 31, United States Code";

extracted.value: The requirement that the recipient 'agrees that its compliance in all respects with all applicable Federal anti-discrimination laws is material to the U.S. Government's payment decisions for purposes of section 3729(b)(4) of title 31, United States Code'

evidence.text: iii. The requirement that the recipient "not use any Grant Funds to fund or promote elective abortions, as required by E.O. 14182, Enforcing the Hyde Amendment";

extracted.value: The requirement that the recipient 'not use any Grant Funds to fund or promote elective abortions, as required by E.O. 14182, Enforcing the Hyde Amendment'

evidence.text: iv. The condition that "the Recipient's use of funds provided under this Agreement … , and the Recipient's operation of projects assisted with Grant Funds are governed by … [a]ll current Executive Orders."

extracted.value: The condition that 'the Recipient's use of funds provided under this Agreement ... are governed by ... [all] current Executive Orders.'

evidence.text: i. The requirement that recipients must "certify[]" that "[T]hey do not, and will not during the term of this financial assistance award, operate any programs that advance or promote DEI, DEIA, or discriminatory equity ideology in violation of Federal anti-discrimination laws."

extracted.value: The requirement that recipients must 'certify[] that [they] do not, and will not during the term of this financial assistance award, operate any programs that advance or promote DEI, DEIA, or discriminatory equity ideology in violation of Federal anti-discrimination laws.'
